text: (porukku cellamal am munahpikkukal tam vitukalil) amarntu konte (poril matinta) tam cakotararkalaip parri; "avarkal enkalaip pinparriyiruntal kollappattirukka mattarkal" enru kurukirarkal; (napiye!) Nir kurum; "ninkal (colvatil) unmaiyalarkalanal unkalai maranam anukavannam tatuttu vitunkal" (parppom enru)
